penomior.midnightconfig.title: Penomior Mod Config
penomior.midnightconfig.dmgReceiveExclud: Excluded the damage intake that by-pass Iframe
penomior.midnightconfig.attackExcludedEn: Excluded the Entities that by-pass Iframe
penomior.midnightconfig.iFrameDuration.t: How many ticks of i-frames does an entity get when damaged, from 10 (default) 0.5 sec, to 2^31-1 (nothing can take damage)
penomior.midnightconfig.attackCancelThre: How weak a player's attack can be before it gets nullified, from 0 (0%, cancels multiple attacks on the same tick) to 1 (100%, players cannot attack), or -0.1 (disables this feature)
penomior.midnightconfig.knockbackCancelT: How weak a player's attack can be before the knockback gets nullified, from 0 (0%, cancels multiple attacks on the same tick) to 1 (100%, no knockback), or -0.1 (disables this feature)
penomior.midnightconfig.backattack.toolt: BackAttack Feature when attack from behind damage 1.5 time
